column4: Can anyone help me with my blue pixel problem in ubuntu 9,10? i need to edit a video for school work! but it's all blue..
which video editor are you trying to use and what is the source of the video you are trying to edit?
im using Kdenlive. and i have downloaded several clips from youtube that i edit and mix, but theyre blue when wieved with VLC
Might be the lack of a codec
